name: Dr. Mehedi Hasan
details: Expert in heart-related diseases and surgeries. Provides preventive care and advanced treatment plans for cardiac patients.

name: Dr. Ayesha Rahman
details: Specializes in neurological disorders. Offers comprehensive care for conditions like stroke, epilepsy, and migraines.

name: Dr. Tanvir Islam
details: Provides care for infants and children. Focuses on preventive healthcare, vaccinations, and growth monitoring.

name: Dr. Fatema Noor
details: Expert in women's health and maternity care. Offers guidance on reproductive health, pregnancy, and hormonal issues.

name: Dr. Imran Hossain
details: Skin, hair, and nail specialist. Treats conditions like acne, eczema, psoriasis, and conducts cosmetic dermatology procedures.

name: Dr. Sabrina Akter
details: Ear, nose, and throat care expert. Provides treatments for sinus problems, hearing issues, and voice disorders.

name: Dr. Shakib Al Hasan
details: Bone and joint specialist. Expert in fracture management, sports injuries, and joint replacement surgeries.

name: Dr. Farhana Khatun
details: Expert in eye care and surgery. Provides treatment for cataracts, glaucoma, and vision correction procedures.

name: Dr. Rashidul Islam
details: Mental health and counseling expert. Offers therapy and medication management for depression, anxiety, and stress disorders.

name: Dr. Nabila Sultana
details: Specialist in hormone-related disorders. Provides care for diabetes, thyroid issues, and metabolic conditions.

name: Dr. Hasan Mahmud
details: Expert in digestive system diseases. Offers treatment for ulcers, liver disorders, and gastrointestinal issues.

name: Dr. Rukhsana Begum
details: Specialist in lung and respiratory care. Treats asthma, COPD, and provides critical care for respiratory illnesses.
